question: My antivirus is detecting the game as a virus and deleting it, what do I do?
answer: This is a false positive. Some antivirus programs read the exe as a threat. You can whitelist / add the game folder as an exclusion to your antivirus program

question: I am getting the error "the application has failed to start because its side-by-side configuration is incorrect. Please see the application event log or use the command-line sxtrace.exe tool for more detail", how do I resolve this?
answer:
You will need to download and install "Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 SP1 Redistributable Package (x86)".
Pick from one of the following links:
  • Link from LFE mainsite
  • Link from Microsoft

question: Is this game on Mobile/Android? Can you make it for Mobile/Android?
answer:
No, unfortunately this game is not on mobile or android devices.
This game is a mod of the 1999 freeware game Little Fighter 2 which is a Windows game only.
If you can somehow emulate a Windows PC on your mobile device then maybe you can play the game on your mobile device.

question: Can you please add [CHARACTER] to the game?
answer:
We have our own list of characters that we plan on adding to the game in our own schedule.
Stayed tuned and continue to follow for updates to see which characters will be coming next!
